PropertySetDef.Name: Pset_CableSegmentTypeEarthingConductor
PropertySetDef.Definition: Properties of earthing conductors used in overhead contact line systems. This property set is applicable to a type or occurence of IfcCableSegment with predefined type CONDUCTORSEGMENT.

PropertyDef.Name: ResistanceToGround
PropertyDef.Definition: The resistance through earthing conductor to the ground. Real part of the impedance to earth [SOURCE IEC: 195-01-18]
